ing: 1 pinch cayenne pepper, or to taste
des: "I drink virgin bloody marys for breakfast pretty regularly. To me this is the perfect marriage of flavor for those of you who enjoy this delicious drink. Add alcohol when you're feeling extra zippy."
ins: Stir tomato juice, steak sauce, barbeque sauce, celery seed, garlic salt, and black pepper in a large pitcher. Serve in glasses over ice and garnish each serving with a pinch of cayenne pepper, a lemon wedge,  and a celery stick.
